src:
Quelques oeuvres de la collection «Tout-Monde» au MBAM
06 Nov 2019 by Le Devoir


1. Brendan Lee Satish Tang, Manga Ormolu #7, 2015.Jean-François Brière / MBAM



2. Adonis Flores, «Oratoria», 2007MBAM, don de la famille Louise et Bernard Lamarre



3. Takashi Murakami, Sage, 2014. © 2014 Takashi Murakami / Kaikai Kiki CoVirginia Museum of Fine Arts



4. Théodore Deck, grand plat, vers 1870-1880Christine Guest / MBAM



5. Michel Huneault, «Mille grues en origami à Onagawa», 2015Michel Huneault



6. Mochica, Pérou, Côte Nord, Bouteille à anse en étrier de type « vase portrait », 450-900 ECChristine Guest / MBAM



7. Nuna, Burkina Faso, Région au nord de Bobo- Dioulasso, Masque koan, Début 20e siècleHugues Dubois Paris-Bruxelles



8. Richard Milette, Trahison, de la série «Des mots et des images», 1996, céramiqueChristine Guest / MBAM
text:
Some works from the "All-World" collection at the MMFA
06 Nov 2019 by Le Devoir


1. Brendan Lee Satish Tang, Ormolu Manga # 7, 2015.Jean-François Brière / MBAM



2. Adonis Flores, "Oratoria", 2007MBAM, gift of the Louise and Bernard Lamarre family



3. Takashi Murakami, Sage, 2014. © 2014 Takashi Murakami / Kaikai Kiki CoVirginia Museum of Fine Arts



4. Théodore Deck, large dish, circa 1870-1880Christine Guest / MBAM



5. Michel Huneault, "Thousand origami cranes at Onagawa", 2015Michel Huneault



6. Mochica, Peru, North Coast, "Portrait Vase" Stirrup Handle Bottle, 450-900 ECC Guest Guest / MBAM



7. Nuna, Burkina Faso, North Bobo-Dioulasso Region, Koan Mask, Early 20th CenturyHugues Dubois Paris-Bruxelles



8. Richard Milette, Betrayal, from the series "Words and Images", 1996, CeramicChristine Guest / MBAM
